title: When you play a mechanically skilled champion...
body:
... And beat your laner only to hear them cry in all chat :

http://41.media.tumblr.com/8dccd2f9fd89f857290917789e7b53a8/tumblr_o47o8zWF521uddrvko1_1280.jpg?redirect

replies.body:
Can {{champion:17}} be considered mechanically intensive?
I mean, just stating the facts, there aren't many Teemo mains in high elo, so.
:3

> [{quoted}](name=Ayketh,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=N3fNvKfL,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-03-30T05:03:29.058+0000)
>
> He's morally intensive.

Where is the lie.

just got teemo the other day and been taking him support, don't think I've lost more than one game with the little stinkmonger, my tilt inducing satanic character roster is growing, but I meeeean teemo is if you think about it mechanically intensive

since you got to know how the other people are going to react so you can ambush surprise and subsequently murder them with your little satanic dots
Gonna get salted on by all the pussy bronzes but I had a TF tell me I played the easiest champion in the game when I beat him as Yasuo, while his friend was playing Yasuo in a different lane.

"Omg y u play broken Azir in normal so izi just spam soldier"

"Dude the only thing that's broken about him is his buglist."

Different Story:
Go ham on a Level 15 Annie as LB because the Diamond Vayne sh!ts on your own botlane, then watch her complain when you kill her with Flash + ignite due to her E'ing you away. We lost but the hypocrisy was insane.
